review: 5 stars for this Chromecast for my limited purposes. I have a Roku 2 that I have been using for well over a year for my streaming subscriptions and some channels like PBS and Smithsonian, for which it works well enough most of the time. I use the Chromecast for streaming home videos from my PC, casting the PC screen, slideshows and the like. It works very well for this (and unlike PLEX at $5/mo, it is free, though rather more limited and it only does local network casting). I have not tried it for my subscription services so cannot comment on this, though at some point I may see if it relieves some buffering we occasionally experience (even with 6Mb/S broadband). (I do not believe it does direct Amazon Prime, one of my services).
